application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to front roofslope, one roof light to rear roofslope and one roof light to side roofslope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): SK_SP02 Existing Site Block Plan; SK_P000 Existing Ground Floor Level Plan; SK_P001 Existing First Floor Level Plan; SK_P002 Existing Loft Level Plan; SK_P003 Existing Roof Plan; SK_E001 Existing East Facing Elevation to Street; SK_E002 Existing North Facing Elevation to No. 10 Golden Manor; SK_E003 Existing West Facing Elevation to Rear Garden; SK_E004 Existing South Facing Elevation to Shared Alleyway; SK_S001 Existing Section AA; SK_S002 Existing Section BB; SK_S003 Existing Section CC; SK_P100 Proposed Ground Floor Level Plan (Rev. A); SK_P101 Proposed First Floor Level Plan(Rev. A); SK_P102 Proposed Loft Level Plan(Rev. A); SK_P103 Proposed Roof Plan(Rev. A); SK_E101 Proposed East Facing Elevation to Street(Rev. A); SK_E102 Proposed North Facing Elevation to No. 10 Golden Manor(Rev. A); SK_E103 Proposed West Facing Elevation to Rear Garden(Rev. A); SK_E104 Proposed South Facing Elevation to Shared Alleyway(Rev. A); SK_S101 Proposed Section AA(Rev. A); SK_S102 Proposed Section BB(Rev. A); SK_S103 Proposed Section CC(Rev. A); 8GM_DAS_01 Design & Access and Heritage Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
